# Ali Imam Components

Ali Imam components integrated and adapted for the Digital Garden design system.

## Source

All components are from [Ali Imam](https://aliimam.in/).

## Components

### Backgrounds

- GridPattern - [Source](https://aliimam.in/docs/backgrounds/grid-pattern)
- DotPattern - [Source](https://aliimam.in/docs/backgrounds/dot-pattern)
- ShineBorder - [Source](https://aliimam.in/docs/backgrounds/shine-border)
- ShaderRGB - [Source](https://aliimam.in/docs/backgrounds/shader-rgb)
- ParticleCircle ⭐⭐ - [Source](https://aliimam.in/docs/backgrounds/particle-circle)
- RenderCanvas - [Source](https://aliimam.in/docs/backgrounds/render-canvas)
- ScrollProgress - [Source](https://aliimam.in/docs/backgrounds/scroll-progress)

### Text

- FontWeight - [Source](https://aliimam.in/docs/texts/font-weight)

### Other

- AvatarGroup - [Source](https://aliimam.in/docs/backgrounds/avatar-group)
